LeGuide.com Group jest obecna w 14 krajach i list ponad 60.000 sklepów i 135 milionów produktów. (* Kwiecie? comScore 2010 r.) Leguide.com funkcje Va Le modu? vous d'permettre synchronizator e l'ensemble de votre boutique vers LeGuide.com automatiquement en en compte l'prenant ordonnancement spécifique LeGuide.com Cela va à vous donner la possibilité de développer et votre activité en avant de mettre stronie votre et vos meilleures * w j?zyku angielskim. module.name: iadvize
module.description: Give your visitors support wherever they are! Increase your sales with iAdvize: Click to Chat, Click to call, Click to video
module.description_full: Give your visitors support wherever they are! Increase your sales with iAdvize: Click to Chat, Click to call, Click to video. The device your visitors are using should not prevent them from getting fast, free and easy support. Desktop, tablet, smartphone... iAdvize enables you to advise your visitors wherever and whenever!
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rates On ecommerce websites, an average of only 2% of visitors complete their purchase without support. That's a long way off compared to the transformation rate in shops which is approximately 55%. Today, Click to Chat and Click to Call are the channels which offer the best conversion rate: on average, 20% of visitors who receive support finalise their purchase. Generate incremental sales With iAdvize, your agents can offer help in the right place and at the right time. This way, transform your visitors into clients thanks to the help of support and sales agents! The methodology we use to measure the increment enables us to calculate the sales which would not have been completed if the agent had not provided the support needed.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: prestanotify

With this module, inform your customers of a flash sale, of sales, promotions, and guide them on their arrival in your online shop. Very easy to use: you only have one image or text to add, create a link on the page a match, and you make additional sales in the category of your choice. ﻿
module.additional_description: Box Notification helps you to increase your sales!

module.description_full: Exclusive PrestaShop Addons, the Amazon Market Place module is the #1 solution to export products on Amazon, import and manage orders from the marketplace.
module.additional_description: You can easily integrate your PrestaShop store to the world’s top marketplace and significantly increase your sales. You import your orders into your PrestaShop store and centralize your stocks. Managing your inventory efficiently and quickly honoring your Amazon orders allows you to increase the degree of customer satisfaction and thus automatically increase the rank of your seller performance. The design of the module is based on the initial experience of online retailers. The module was developed by an online retailer for the service of his colleagues and it was developed by a team of professional developers, by making it easy to use and to have the maximum efficiency. Your purchase is protected by free technical support that is provided unconditionally until the products are placed online and the first orders are imported.
module.author: Common-Services

module.name: pm_advancedsearch4
module.description: Najlepszy moduł Award - Dodaj najszybszą opcję wyszukiwania dostępną dla PrestaShop
module.description_full: Najlepszy moduł Award - Dodaj najszybszą opcję wyszukiwania dostępną dla PrestaShop
module.additional_description: Zaproponuj klientom asortyment produktów zgodny z ich oczekiwaniami. Niezbędne narzędzie dla sklepów oferujących szeroki wybór produktów, Advanced Search 4 pozwala na dodanie dowolnej ilości wyszukiwarek oraz na umieszczenie ich w różnych miejscach witryny internetowej. Moduł ten został rozwinięty w trosce o możliwie najkrótszy czas pobierania, nawet ciężkich katalogów. Odwiedzający będą mogli przeglądać produkty odpowiadające kryteriom wyszukiwania w celu szybkiego dokonania zakupów. Zwycięzca konkursu Best Modules Awards 2012 Advanced Search 4 został wybrany najlepszym modułem roku w konkursie BarCamp PrestaShop w Barcelonie (Hiszpania) ! Niezbędne narzędzie dla sklepów oferujących szeroki wybór produktów. Advanced Search 4 wprowadza multi-nawigację fasetową, wyszukiwanie etapowe, filtry oraz wielokrotne kryteria wyszukiwania. Każde wyszukiwanie w trakcie nawigacji klienta jest zachowywane w pamięci, aby w każdej chwili umożliwić mu odszukanie wyników wyszukiwania. Google jest jego przyjacielem Moduł PrestaShop spowodował małą rewolucję w pozycjonowaniu SEO. Dzięki Advaced Search 4 możliwe jest masowe tworzenie stron produktów zoptymalizowanych pod kątem SEO oraz bez ryzyka powielania treści (duplicate content)! Wybierz kryteria, według których chciałbyś ulepszyć swoje pozycjonowanie, potwierdź i korzystaj z setek stron internetowych, na których wyświetlane są Twoje produkty, zawierających: przepisywanie adresów URL, nagłówki H1, opisy, znaczniki meta, automatyczne linkowanie krzyżowe... W celu optymizacji widoczności, strony internetowe z wynikami wyszukiwania mogą być wyświetlane na głównych portalach społecznościowych oraz drogą e-mailową.

module.name: pm_seointernallinking
module.description: Polepsz naturalne pozycjonowanie serwisu dzięki siatce wewnętrznej
module.description_full: Polepsz naturalne pozycjonowanie serwisu dzięki siatce wewnętrznej
module.additional_description: Zoptymalizuj naturalne pozycjonowanie Twojego sklepu internetowego na PrestaShop Siatka wewnętrzna polega na tworzeniu linków między poszczególnymi stronami Twojego sklepu internetowego pod kątem słów kluczowych, za pomocą których osiągniesz wyższe pozycjonowanie strony w wyszukiwarce Google. Aby zoptymalizować pozycjonowanie Twojej witryny internetowej, niezbędne jest utworzenie linkowania wewnętrznego serwisu, które pozwoli wyszukiwarkom internetowym na możliwie najbardziej swobodne przeglądanie Twojego sklepu internetowego. Celem jest dostarczenie maksymalnej ilości informacji przy możliwie najniższej liczbie kliknięć. SEO Internal Linking optymalizuje porządek nawigacji w Twoim sklepie internetowym oraz odgrywa ważną strategiczną rolę naturalnego pozycjonowania. Określ frazy kluczowe oraz strony docelowe, na których będzie się opierać rangowanie strony, a moduł opracuje wewnętrzne linkowanie za Ciebie! Jeśli chcesz móc dodawać automatyczne linki do opisów stron kategorii, to zainstaluj nasz moduł HTML on Descriptions. Czy dobra siatka wewnętrzna naprawdę działa? Siatka linkowania wewnętrznego serwisu ze słowami kluczowymi stanowi sprawdzoną metodę optymalizacji dla wyszukiwarek. Zwłaszcza, jeśli ma się na celu trafność treści. Jako niedogodności, należy wiedzieć, że instalacja tych linków jest długa i żmudna oraz wymaga postępowania zgodnego z zaleceniami SEO, które musi być regularnie aktualizowane zgodnie ze zmianami nanoszonymi w katalogu, inaczej zbyt wysokie wyniki wyszukiwania mogą zostać wykryte a sama strona może zostać wyeliminowana przez Google. To właśnie w tej optyce rozwinęliśmy nasz moduł, który pozwoli Wam na utworzenie setek linków krzyżowych między stronami serwisu w zaledwie kilka minut, przy tym szanując zalecenia zawarte w praktycznym przewodniku SEO White Hat. Przewodnik ten został napisany z myślą o agencjach SEO oraz o sklepach internetowych. Jego zastosowanie jest bardzo proste.
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: ordertaxprofitreport
module.displayName: Advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports
module.description: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file
module.description_full: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file.
module.additional_description: Get perfect visibility on your shop's and products' profitability ! The default PrestaShop installation does not provide a one-click tool that allows you to obtain important accounting and financial data: tax due, net sales volume after discounts and, most importantly, profit and profit margin. Not only will this report provide you with all this data, but it will even allow you to answer questions like "what percentage of total sales and / or profits does this specific brand, supplier or product category represent ?". This stylish and pleasant AJAX based module allows you to generate different types of preformed reports with all this information. They can be viewed on screen in HTML format or exported as a CSV file to manipulate in Excel and / or import into any other information or accounting system. This module is developed and published by Business Tech, certified PrestaShop developer and winner of the 2011 PrestaShop Awards for Best module. You are guaranteed to buy a quality module and to get fast and efficient tech support in case you need it.
module.author: Business Tech
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/pl/statystyki-analizy-prestashop-moduly/5255-advanced-sales-tax-profit-and-profit-margin-reports.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports

module.displayName: Product out of stock : emails and number of requests
module.description: The module will allow you to know how many customers are waiting for a product and to obtain your customers mail address who wishes to receive an alert when a product will be out of stock
module.description_full: The module will allow you to know how many customers are waiting for a product and to obtain your customers mail address who wishes to receive an alert when a product will be out of stock.
module.additional_description: If you have a product out of stock, the module "Alert mail" from PrestaShop allows you to collect address mails without knowing how many times your product is solicited and who have wanted to order. With the module ”Product out of stock : emails and number of requests”, you can get: -    The number of request by product, -    Customer emails address. Optimize your suppliers orders and thank to the product quantity praised, improve your restocking. During out of stock, obtain a maximum of email address and identify the expectations of your customers according to the different articles for a better inventory management. Allow your customers to be advised on the renewal of your stock to let them come back again in your shop.
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/pl/statystyki-analizy-prestashop-moduly/6320-product-out-of-stock-emails-and-number-of-requests.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=product out of stock : emails and number of requests

module.name: pm_multiplefeatures
module.additional_description: Dodaj nieograniczoną liczbę charakterystyk! Dzięki Multiple Featuresmasz możliwość przyznania jednemu produktowi lub jednej charakterystyce tyle wartości, ile to konieczne. W ten sposób, możesz korzystać z PrestaShop bez ograniczeń oraz w pełni wykorzystywać dane charakerystyki! Jeśli poza tym korzystasz z Advanced Search 4 (Zdobywca trofeum PrestaShop Best Module Awards 2012), to umożliwiasz odwiedzającym Twój katalog jeszcze dokładniejsze wyszukiwanie. Przypadek klienta: Ocarat.com: "Niektóre wyroby jubilerskie mogą mieć różny skład oraz aliaż kilku metali. Back Office od PrestaShop daje możliwość połączenia danych cech z produktem. Mianowicie, chciałbym dodać do mojego sklepu złoty pierścionek oprawiony diamentami i szmaragdami. Jednak zakładka charakterystyk mi na to nie pozwala. Bowiem nie mogę przypisać kilku cech jednemu przedmiotowi. Muszę wybrać między złotem, diamentami lub szmaragdami. Multiple Features poradził sobie również z tym ograniczeniem!"
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: pm_cachemanager
module.description: Skróć czas ładowania Twojej strony internetowej
module.description_full: Skróć czas ładowania Twojej strony internetowej
module.additional_description: Zwiększ współczynnik konwersji oraz pozycjonowanie sklepu internetowego Statystyki są jasne: głównym powodem, dla którego internauci wychodzą ze strony internetowej, jest zbyt długi czas ładowania strony. Yahoo! Według statystyk wydłużenie czasu ładowania strony internetowej w serwisie Auto zaledwie o 400ms powoduje wzrost współczynnika porzucania strony od 5 do 9%. (Source Performance Web) Ponadto, szybkość wyświetlania jest gwarancją jakości, co ma bardzo pozytywny wpływ na pozycjonowanie strony w wyszukiwarkach internetowych. W ten sposób zagwarantujesz swoim klientom większy komfort nawigacji po własnym serwisie skrócając czas ładowania strony oraz oszczędzając ich czas! Oferta limitowana: niższe ceny i zadowolony lub zwrotowi !

module.additional_description: This module allows you to create full credit notes for any invoices that have been issued and then cancelled. With this module, you can issue credit notes by selecting the invoice you want to refund. It only works with issued invoices. No more problems with invoices and journal entries. With this module, you avoid submitting invoices that have been cancelled. You can also issue credit notes in PDF and send them to your clients.

module.name: ec_seo404
module.displayName: SEO - disabled and deleted 301 redirect Products
module.description: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product
module.description_full: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product. You will be able to choose for each case a 301 (Ideal for SEO)
module.additional_description: Whenever a product is disabled or deleted, you will be able to assign a 301 redirect. No need to turn your catalog to find out which product is not active or has been removed, you can see them with the module and react accordingly. Not overload your HTACCESS file and therefore no notion necessary to make it work ! The SEO which existed to this product will be redirected in confidence to a similar product, category page, etc. ... And not lose all the SEO that page had. With a color scheme, get in a glance the status of your references: - Green => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active. - Orange => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active and no link is specified for the redirection. - Red => Redirection enabled, but no link! So page 404 as usual!
module.author: Ether Création

module.additional_description: This module oriented Merchandising allows you to optimize all your pages, including these you thought it was not possible (Shipping, Secure Payment, Legals, etc..) Highlight a selection of products on your CMS pages. Configure these products by CMS pages directly from your back office easely. Increase your sales.
module.author: Web In Color

module.name: lgcookieslaw
module.displayName: EU Cookie Law (Notification Banner + Cookie Blocker)
module.description: THE ONLY MODULE THAT ALLOWS YOU TO FULLY COMPLY WITH THE EU COOKIE LAW
module.description_full: THE ONLY MODULE THAT ALLOWS YOU TO FULLY COMPLY WITH THE EU COOKIE LAW. Display a responsive and customized warning banner and disable cookies when users enter your website until you obtain their consent.
module.additional_description: Our module fully complies with the European Cookie Law. Complete compliance with the law Besides displaying a warning banner, our module is the only one that allows you to block the cookies when users enter your store. As established by the law, you "shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information." Please note that all the other cookie modules sold on Addons only allows you to display a warning banner regardless of the user consent. Cookies are installed on the users' computer without obtaining their consent and regardless of their will. Main features of the modules Display a warning banner on every page to inform users about the use of cookies and ask for their consent Disable a list of modules when users enter the website because warning users about cookies is useless and illegal if you have already installed cookies on their computer. Enable these cookies after having obtained their consent or maintain them disabled if they refuse. Fully customize the warning banner (colour, text, link, font, position, multilingual mode, transparency...) Getting the user consent   The module includes 3 different ways to ask user consent, you can choose between: Acceptance through a button: Users must click on the "I accept" button in the warning banner to give his consent. As soon as users give their consent, the warning banner disappears and all the modules using cookies will get enabled and will work as usual. But if users refuse to give their consent, the disabled modules will remain disabled. Acceptance through the navigation (with banner disappearance): If users continue browsing the website, they will accept the use of cookies. The warning banner is displayed on the first page on which users arrive with a message like « By continuing browsing the website, you accept the use of cookies ». As soon as users decide to go to another page, the banner automatically disappears and the disabled modules will get enabled. Acceptance through the navigation (without banner disappearance) : If users continue browsing the website, they will accept the use of cookies. Works the same as the previous option except the fact that the banner is always displayed and never disappears. The selected cookies will be disabled when users enter the store and will get enabled only when users will decide to go another page. Note: the consent remains valid during the period of time set in the module interface (we recommend you not to go over 13 months) Customizing the banner content and design As recommended by the European authority, the module allows you to customize the warning message inside the banner (to inform users about the cookies users and their purpose) and add a "More information" button into the banner that take users to a CMS page of your store (to explain in details the use of cookies on your store). The warning banner is responsive and will always be displayed full-width. The module comes with a Wysiwyg editor that allows you to fully customize the content of the banner (font, colour, effects, html code, links...). You can also choose from the configuration page the background colour of the banner, its percentage of opacity (transparency) and its position (top or bottom of the page). Moreover, the module is mutlilingual and automatially detects all the languages of your store, which allows you to set a different warning message per language. Note: the module is designed to not display a warning message when search engines robots cawl you store in order not to affect your SEO. Disabling the modules that use cookies This is the only module that allows you to choose the modules/cookies that you want to disable until users give their consent. This feature is compulsory because it is useless and illegal to inform users if you have already installed cookied on their computer with their consent. "Member States shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information, in accordance with Directive 95/46/EC” EU Cookie Law To comply with the directive of the EU Cookie Law, we recommend you to disable the tracking (Google Analytics), social sharing (Facebook " Like ", Google " +1 ", etc.) and targeted advertising modules. Please note that all modules that are required for the good running of your PrestaShop store (ex: basket cookie, session cookie...) don't require any consents. Multistore mode The module is compatible with multistore and allows you to display the same notification banner on each one of your shop but the consent is the same for all shops. If you accept the use of cookies on one of your shop, the module will consider that you accept the use of cookies for all your other shops (mention it on your cookie policy) and the notification banner will not be shown when you go to your other shops.
module.author: Línea Gráfica

module.name: pushoncart
module.description: Z łatwością zwiększysz średnią wartość koszyka, oferując zniżki dostosowane do indywidualnych klientów dostępne w podsumowaniu koszyka zakupów
module.description_full: Z łatwością zwiększysz średnią wartość koszyka, oferując zniżki dostosowane do indywidualnych klientów dostępne w podsumowaniu koszyka zakupów.
module.additional_description: Dzięki modułowi „Push on Cart”: z łatwością zwiększysz średnią wartość koszyka zakupów Twoich klientów, pozbędziesz się wybranych niesprzedanych produktów z inwentarza, pomożesz klientom odkryć nowe produkty i stworzysz popyt, zwiększysz satysfakcję klientów oraz ich lojalność dzięki dostosowanym zniżkom na wybrane produkty.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: cartabandonmentpro
module.description: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.description_full: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.additional_description: An automatic email is sent to customers each time they add products to their shopping cart but does not purchase. It reminds and encourages them to complete the order. It’s beneficial and easy to use! Automatically send one or more personalized emails to remind your customers about the contents of their cart. This helps turn abandoned carts into sales. Easily create email templates tailored to match your online store’s theme.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: seoexpert
module.description: Increase site traffic by landing on first page search engine results! This SEO Expert module automatically fills in both meta tags and social media meta tags to optimize your online store for better v
module.description_full: Increase site traffic by landing on first page search engine results! This SEO Expert module automatically fills in both meta tags and social media meta tags to optimize your online store for better visibility on search engines and social media platforms. Take the opportunity to buy it at launch cost!
module.additional_description: Automatically create meta tags to save over 40 hours! With the SEO Expert module: Appear on first page results on search engines like Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex, etc. Multiply your sales with increased web traffic Improve visibility for each language of your store Increase your conversions with qualified traffic Differentiate your store with fully customized rules for product and category pages Leverage Facebook and Twitter to acquire even more customers Optimize your online store for social media with adapted shared titles
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: giftcards
module.description: Increase your sales and get more customers by offering them the chance to give the perfect gift with no risks with the Gift Card module developed by PrestaShop! Practical and simple, gift cards are
module.description_full: Increase your sales and get more customers by offering them the chance to give the perfect gift with no risks with the Gift Card module developed by PrestaShop! Practical and simple, gift cards are at the top of the list of the most given gifts!
module.additional_description: This solution provides the possibility of offering gift cards for any amount you like in your store. Every customer can buy your gift cards to offer people the chance to come and spend them in your store. This module allows you to: Pick up new customers: gift card beneficiaries represent a market of new prospects you can’t pass up! Increase your sales: gift card beneficiaries often spend more than the amount bought on the card. Encourage indecisive customers to buy: if you offer a simple gift, suitable for all targets, customers won’t hesitate. The gift card market brings great success with consumers and its annual growth varies between 20% and 40%.
module.author: PrestaShop
